mapper.select: select provinceofchina.name,healRate as value from provinceofchina ORDER BY healRate desc limit 10
select provinceofchina.name,nowConfirm as value from provinceofchina
select id, province, name, confirm, nowConfirm, suspect, dead, heal, deadRate, healRate from provinceofchina where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into provinceofchina(province, name, confirm, nowConfirm, suspect, dead, heal, deadRate, healRate) values (#{province}, #{name}, #{confirm}, #{nowconfirm}, #{suspect}, #{dead}, #{heal}, #{deadrate}, #{healrate})

insert into provinceofchina(province, name, confirm, nowConfirm, suspect, dead, heal, deadRate, healRate) values
(#{entity.province}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.confirm}, #{entity.nowconfirm}, #{entity.suspect}, #{entity.dead}, #{entity.heal}, #{entity.deadrate}, #{entity.healrate})

insert into provinceofchina(province, name, confirm, nowConfirm, suspect, dead, heal, deadRate, healRate) values
(#{entity.province}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.confirm}, #{entity.nowconfirm}, #{entity.suspect}, #{entity.dead}, #{entity.heal}, #{entity.deadrate}, #{entity.healrate})
on duplicate key update province = values(province), name = values(name), confirm = values(confirm), nowConfirm = values(nowConfirm), suspect = values(suspect), dead = values(dead), heal = values(heal), deadRate = values(deadRate), healRate = values(healRate)
mapper.update:
update provinceofchina
province = #{province},
name = #{name},
confirm = #{confirm},
nowConfirm = #{nowconfirm},
suspect = #{suspect},
dead = #{dead},
heal = #{heal},
deadRate = #{deadrate},
healRate = #{healrate},
where id = #{id}
